meanings: slap a person[someone in the face] with a smile
A smiling house will have good fortune
You cannot spit on a smiling face, A soft answer turns away wrath

meanings.meaning: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.

vlive.korean: [빵 터진 유겸 유겸이 웃은 이유는?] [YUGYEOM bursting in laughter, why?] View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #2
잠깐만 눈을 감은 거야 웃은 거야? Wait, did you close your eyes or smile? 듣기 View video AB6IX : [Replay] AB6IX 1ST ALBUM [6IXENSE] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Wait, did you close your eyes or smile?

vlive.korean: 진짜 너무 웃겨 - 어떻게 웃은 거야 방금? It was so hilarious. - How did you do that? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 아기다리고기다리던공공즈😁
vlive.english: It was so hilarious. - How did you do that?

vlive.korean: 내가 엄청 웃은 거... 아! The one that got me laughing hard. Ah! 듣기 View video BTOB : 갑분라
vlive.english: The one that got me laughing hard. Ah!

vlive.korean: [오 마이 갓! 나보고 웃은 거 맞지?] [Oh, my god! Did they smile at me?] View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.01 - Part.2
vlive.english: [Oh, my god! Did they smile at me?]

examples.korean: My doctor's laughsitive made me laugh more than I have in years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 의사의 웃음 치료는 몇 년 동안 웃은 것보다 더 많이 웃게 했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: My doctor's laughsitive made me laugh more than I have in years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 함께 웃은 사람은 잊어도, 함께 운 사람은 잊혀지지 않는다. (아랍속담, 친구속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It wasn’t because of joy or happiness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 재미나 행복 때문에 웃은 것은 아니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: It wasn’t because of joy or happiness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Yes, but it was the tortoise who won the race in the end and laughed last! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래, 하지만 결국 경주에서 이겨 최후에 웃은 건 바로 거북이였어! TIMES CORE
examples.english: Yes, but it was the tortoise who won the race in the end and laughed last! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Have you ever noticed how wonderful you feel after a good belly laugh ? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러분은 배꼽을 잡고 웃은 후의 기분이 얼마나 좋은지 느껴보신 적 있으십니까? TIMES CORE
examples.english: Have you ever noticed how wonderful you feel after a good belly laugh ? Add to Wordbook
